div.p: ONLINE USER: Make sure you're not drinking in the morning, because if you do, then you have a major problem.
RAY: Well, that's like saying as long as you drink in the evenings you won't have problems, or end up with alcoholism.
RAY: People with alcoholism might drink in the morning because they're addicted, but the time of day someone drinks doesn't determine if they'll develop alcoholism.
